= SPINAL CORD STRUCTURE =

== BASIC INFORMATIOIN ==

http://www.dartmouth.edu/~humananatomy/figures/chapter_3/3-2_files/image002.jpg

  * regions - cervical (C1-C8), thoracic (T1-T12), lumbar (L1-L5), sacral (S1-S5), coccygeal (CX = CX1-CX3)
  * width - 1 cm (thoracic/sacral) /2 cm (cervical-lumbar)
  * height - 45 cm (men)/43 cm (women)

== SPINAL CORD SENSORY AND MOTOR ROOTS NEURONS ==
(generated)

*Fibers by thickness*:

 * *A-alpha*(mixed, 12-22 mcm, 70-120 m/sec): low theshold, 2ms after stimulus (endings: ; type Ia,Ib; motoneurons, touch, position and velocity)
  * *A-alpha-Ia*(mixed)
   * *A-alpha-Ia-motor* - alpha motoneurons(motor)
   * *A-alpha-Ia-sensory*(sensory): skin, two-point discrimination (endings: SMC; muscle spindle primary sensory endings; extrafusal muscles, Meissner's corpuscles)
  * *A-alpha-Ib-sensory*(sensory): report load being applied to muscle, stretching of skin (endings: SGT,SRC)
 * *A-beta*(mixed, 8-13 mcm, 40-70 m/sec): higher theshold, 4ms after stimulus (endings: ; type II; fine touch, kinesthesia, muscle spindle secondary endings)
  * *A-beta-motor* - beta motoneurons(motor): skeleto-fusimotor, intrafusal fibers and collaterals to extrafusal muscle fibers, muscle spindles, increase dynamic sensitivity of ending (endings: MBD,MBS)
  * *A-beta-sensory*(sensory): fine touch, kinesthesia (endings: SMD,SRC,SHF,SPC)
 * *A-delta-sensory*(sensory, 1-4 mcm, 5-15 m/sec): noxious, cold, pressure; 20ms after stimulus (endings: SFN,SCR,SPC; III; thinly-myelinated; noxious receptors (first/fast, sharp, well-localized pain); cold receptors (temperature, high-threshold mechano/heat, phasic); pressure (rapidly adapting mechanosensitive, directional selectivity, crude touch))
 * *A-gamma-motor*(motor, 4-8 mcm, 15-40 m/sec): intrafusal muscle fibers, 6ms after stimulus (endings: MGD,MGS; skeletal muscle tone, contract muscle spindles from both ends, fusimotor gamma neurons, affect Ia/II)
 * *B-motor*(motor, 1-3 mcm, 3-14 m/sec): preganglionic autonomic (endings: MPA; myelinated, ACh, sympathetic only in T1-L3, IML)
 * *C*(mixed, 0.1-1 mcm, 0.2-2 m/sec): pain, touch, pressure, temperature, postganglionic autonomic (endings: ; 60ms after stimulus)
  * *C-motor*(motor): postganglionic autonomic (endings: MPG-S,MPG-P)
  * *C-sensory*(sensory): pain and temperature (endings: SFN-CN,SFN-CW,SFN-CI,SFN-CT,SFN-CM)

== SPINAL CORD TRACTS ==
(generated)

TRACT SET: *Ascending Tracts*

<img src="http://intranet.tdmu.edu.ua/data/kafedra/internal/anatomy/classes_stud/en/med/lik/ptn/1/19%20SPINAL%20CORD.%20BASE%20OF%20THE%20BRAIN.files/image044.jpg">

 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anterolateral_system TRACT]: *anterolateral system*; conveys pain, temperature (protopathic sensation), and crude touch from the periphery to the brain
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spinothalamic_tract TRACT STT]: *spinothalamic tract*; transmits information to thalamus about pain, temperature, itch and crude touch (conscious)
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nociception TRACT PSTT]: *paleospinothalamic tract*; transmits pain mainly from the peripheral slow-chronic type C pain fibers (cervical-anterior-toward-contralateral, thoracic, lumbar, sacral-lateral slices)
    * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anterior_spinothalamic_tract TRACT ASTT]: *anterior spinothalamic tract* (anterolateral tract); pain, temperature, light touch (tactile sensibility), two-point discrimination, stereognosis; path: {skin - slow pain, temperature, slightly tactile} -> {BA 3,1,2}
     * slightly tactile (head and body MD,MC,PC,HF receptors to S1: fibers=C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
    * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lateral_spinothalamic_tract TRACT LSTT]: *lateral spinothalamic tract*; pain, temperature; path: {body pain, temperature, crude touch} -> {BA 3,1,2}
     * pain, temperature (head and body FN,RC receptors to marginal nucleus: fibers=A-delta,C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG Marginal Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.MG]
      * pain, temperature for emotion (marginal nucleus to insula: fibers=A-delta,C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG Marginal Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.MG] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPI Ventral Posteroinferior Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPI] -> [BrainRegionPHA_NC_INS_PIC Posterior Insular Cortex,PHA.NC.INS.PIC]
      * pain, temperature for reward (marginal nucleus to frontal lobe: fibers=A-delta,C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG Marginal Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.MG] -> [BrainRegionFCA_FD_TH_MD Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus,FCA.FD.TH.MD] -> [BrainRegionCGA_NC_DACG Dorsal Anterior Cingulate Area,CGA.NC.DACG]
   * [http://www.neuroanatomy.wisc.edu/virtualbrain/BrainStem/03CNV.html TRACT TTT]: *trigeminothalamic tract* (neospinothalamic tract); all somatosensory submodalities from head
    * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anterior_trigeminothalamic_tract TRACT]: *anterior trigeminothalamic tract* (ventral trigeminothalamic tract); awareness of the exact location of the painful stimulus; pain, temperature, and crude touch pathway; path: {face, head and neck} -> {SI - BA 1,2}
     * nociceptors (head, face and intraoral structures nociceptors to spinal trigeminal nucleus: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG Trigeminal Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.TRG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM.STR]
     * nociceptors (nociceptors of cranial nerves VII to spinal trigeminal nucleus: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_GNG Geniculate Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.GNG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM.STR]
     * nociceptors (nociceptors of cranial nerves IX,X to spinal trigeminal nucleus: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_JUG Jugular Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.JUG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM.STR]
     * nociceptors (nociceptors of cranial nerves X to spinal trigeminal nucleus: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD Nodose Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.NOD] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM.STR]
     * nociceptors (spinal trigeminal nucleus to S1: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM.STR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
    * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dorsal_trigeminal_tract TRACT]: *dorsal trigeminal tract* (dorsal trigeminothalamic tract, lemniscus); immediate awareness of a painful sensation; pressure and tactile discrimination sensation; path: {head MC,PC} -> {SII - BA 40,43}
     * face dull, burning pain, deep, aching pain, temperature and crude touch (head, face and intraoral structures to Precentral Cortex: fibers=C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG Trigeminal Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.TRG] -> [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR Principal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HP.PTP.PTR]
      * face dull, burning pain, deep, aching pain, temperature and crude touch (head, face and intraoral structures to Precentral Cortex: fibers=C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR Principal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HP.PTP.PTR] -> [BrainRegionBGA_FD_TH_PF Parafascicular Nucleus of Thalamus,BGA.FD.TH.PF] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PO_PCC Precentral Cortex,SMA.NC.PO.PCC]
      * pain, temperature for emotion (marginal nucleus to insula: fibers=C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR Principal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HP.PTP.PTR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPI Ventral Posteroinferior Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPI] -> [BrainRegionPHA_NC_INS_PIC Posterior Insular Cortex,PHA.NC.INS.PIC]
      * pain, temperature for reward (marginal nucleus to frontal lobe: fibers=C, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR Principal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HP.PTP.PTR] -> [BrainRegionFCA_FD_TH_MD Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus,FCA.FD.TH.MD] -> [BrainRegionCGA_NC_DACG Dorsal Anterior Cingulate Area,CGA.NC.DACG]
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medial_lemniscus TRACT]: *medial lemniscus*; transmits touch, vibration sense, proprioception data
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posterolateral_tract TRACT]: *dorsolateral column* (dorsolateral fasciculus, dorsolateral funiculus, posterolateract tract); discriminative pain and temperature information (location, intensity and quality)
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spinocervical_pathway TRACT]: *spinocervical tract* (Morin's tract); static position, Ruffini endings (thoracic-toward-contralateral and cervical slices); path: {receptors of thoracic and lower limbs, T7-CX} -> {somatosensory cortex}
    * tactile/pressure pathway from the spinal cord to sensory cortex (tactile/pressure to S1: fibers=A-alpha,A-beta, receptors=SRC): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_NP Proprius Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.NP] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV Lateral Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LCV]
     * four-neuron, fast-conducting, tactile/pressure pathway from the spinal cord to sensory cortex (tactile/pressure to S1: fibers=A-alpha,A-beta, receptors=SRC): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV Lateral Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LCV] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
     * alerts about presence of cutaneous stimuli that might represent danger, necessitating flight (cutaneous stimuli to PAG: fibers=A-alpha,A-beta, receptors=SRC): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV Lateral Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LCV] -> [BrainRegionFBA_MM_PAG Periaqueductal Gray Matter,FBA.MM.PAG]
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posterolateral_tract TRACT DLF]: *tract of Lissauer, fast pain* (fasciculus of Lissauer, tract/zone of Lissauer, dorsolateral fasciculus, dorsolateral tract); fast pain; intraspinal, discriminative pain and temperature information - location, intensity and quality (pain duration equals to stimulus duration); path: {A-delta pain fibers to hypothalamus, to posterior column} -> {neocortex BA 3b}
    * autonomic and homeostatic functions, initial sharp localization of pain (body to hypothalamus and neocortex: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG Marginal Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.MG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN Lateral Spinal Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LSN]
     * autonomic and homeostatic functions, and related motivational and affective responses to autonomic function (body to hypothalamus: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN Lateral Spinal Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LSN] -> [BrainRegionHTA_FD_HT_AH Anterior Hypothalamic Nucleus,HTA.FD.HT.AH]
     * from lateral LSN; joins fasciculus cuneatus; initial sharp localization of pain (upper body to neocortex BA 3b: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN Lateral Spinal Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LSN] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU Cuneate Nucleus,BMA.HM.CU] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
     * from medial LSN; joins fasciculus gracilis; initial sharp localization of pain (lower body to neocortex BA 3b: fibers=A-delta, receptors=SFN): [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN Lateral Spinal Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LSN] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_GR Gracile Nucleus,BMA.HM.GR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posterior_column-medial_lemniscus_pathway TRACT]: *posterior column* (dorsal column, Reils band, Reils ribbon); two point discrimination (fine touch, fine pressure - MC), pressure (deep receptors - PC), vibration (PC), conscious proprioception (MS) (alpha/beta mechanoreceptors, conscious; discrimination of those sensations that an animal must explore actively)
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuneate_fasciculus TRACT]: *fasciculus cuneatus* (tract of Burdach); upper body well-localized discriminative proprioception, fine touch (muscle afferents and cutaneous mechanoreceptors (C1-T6 dermatomes); thoracic-toward-contralateral and cervical slices); path: {upper trunk, forelimb deep structures and skin} -> {neocortex BA 3b, lateral}
    * conscious sensations of head (geniohyoid (C1), head top (C2), head back above neck (C3) to S1 medial: fibers=A-alpha-Ia,A-beta, receptors=SMC,SPC,SHF): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU Cuneate Nucleus,BMA.HM.CU] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPM Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPM] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
    * conscious sensations of neck, trunk, and extremities (neck (C4), trunk (T1-T6), and extremities - arms (C5-T2) to S1 lateral: fibers=A-beta, receptors=SMC,SPC,SHF): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU Cuneate Nucleus,BMA.HM.CU] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gracile_fasciculus TRACT]: *fasciculus gracilis* (tract of Goll); lower body well-localized discriminative fine touch (sacral-toward-contralateral and lumbar slices; mostly cutaneous (proprioception via CLN)); path: {lower body, muscle afferents} -> {somatosensory cortex}
    * epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body (receptors of thoracic and lower limbs, T7-CX to neocortex BA 3b, medial: fibers=A-beta, receptors=SMS,SPC): [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG Dorsal Root Ganglion,AVA.PN.SG.DRG] -> [BrainRegionBMA_HM_GR Gracile Nucleus,BMA.HM.GR] -> [BrainRegionSMA_FD_TH_VPL Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus,SMA.FD.TH.VPL] -> [BrainRegionSMA_NC_PG_S1 Somatosensory Cortex,SMA.NC.PG.S1]
